Luaf

Lua for learning and laufs

References

This repo is not an island. I learned a lot about implementing this from the following sources and possibly used parts of them as well:

  • Lua
  • Lua Sourcecode
  • Lua 5.4 Reference Manual
  • LuaJIT
  • Lune Luau Standalone Runtime
  • Incomplete Lua bytecode reference
  • Lua bytecode explorer
  • Great write up on how lua works and tutorial
  • glua a good reference how someone else did it in Go
  • Roblox Typesafe lua
  • WASM Intro
  • Understanding Every Byte in a WASM Module
  • Go Performance Patterns
  • Go Allocation optimization
  • Cheating the reaper in go
  • Implementing a GC
